cxro.zts2

Class Instruments

  • java.lang.Object
    • cxro.zts2.Instruments

  • public class Instruments
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler for assortment of ZTS2 devices and files.
    Author:
    William Cork <wcork@lbl.gov> Created 2019-12-03

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Instruments()
      Construct a ZTS2 Instrumentation service locator using the current working directory.

      Construct a ZTS2 Instrumentation service locator using the specified base directory.

      • Instruments

        public Instruments()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a ZTS2 Instrumentation service locator using the current working directory. Uses the current value for user.dir.

        java.io.IOException - Generic IO Exception

      • disconnect

        public final void disconnect()
        Disconnect from devices. All device objects are nullified and should not be used.
